Software & Data

Brain xQTL web server:

  • The brain xQTL web server is available here.

GeneMANIA related code and data:

  • MATLAB code for GeneMANIA, including the SW algorithm (from the Bioinformatics 2010 paper) is here.
  • MATLAB code for the 3Prop algorithm is here.
  • New: R code for the 3Prop algorithm is now available here

Tissue co-expression networks:

  • GNAT web tool and code is available here.

Accounting for hidden factors:

  • MATLAB code for the HCP paper is available here.
